examples.example: 我每天都会抽出一些时间上网查阅资料，丰富自己的知识。

translate.english: I will spend some time every day surfing the Internet to look up information and enrich my knowledge.

examples.example: 我们可以通过上网来了解世界各地的最新动态和有趣的故事。

translate.english: We can understand the latest developments and interesting stories all over the world through surfing the Internet.

examples.example: 上网能够让我们便捷地与远方的亲朋好友沟通交流。

translate.english: Surfing the Internet can enable us to communicate with distant relatives and friends conveniently.
